metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5008 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Snoopy allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5008` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libphp-snoopy - 2.0.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libphp-snoopy package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.0-1').
